effect:
Schooling changes Wishiwashi into its School Form, if its HP is above 25% and Wishiwashi is at least level 20. If its HP falls below 25%, Wishiwashi will revert back to Solo Form.
Schooling cannot be removed or replaced via moves like Skill Swap or the Mummy ability.
description: When it has a lot of HP, the Pok√©mon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
